Sam Feldstein's Personal Website

Hi, I'm Sam Feldstein. I'm a web developer, writer, and photographer currently based in Boulder, CO. I won't tell you where I'm from originally, but I'll give you a hint: It's not Idaho or Ohio. I've also lived in Iowa City, Southern California, Far West Texas, and I spent a summer in New Orleans once.

I've been building websites since 2023, and I'm officially trying to establish a clientele. I like building sites for individuals, small businesses, and nonprofits. If you need a developer in your life and that sounds like a good fit, have a look at my portfolio, then kindly hire me.

Latest Website: Danceophile Studio (in progress)

A website for an independent folk dance studio. Built with Astro.
